name: My Fickle Son (Can't Get Enough Games)
name_original: My Fickle Son (Can't Get Enough Games)
description:
Your small computer son wants games! After he gives you a one-word hint, use A and D to cycle through lists of randomly generated Atari games and press Space to choose one for him.  Be careful -- he'll get angry if you give him the wrong games...

My Fickle Son was created for IGDA Chicago's 2019 Retro Game Jam, which challenged participants to make a new game in the style of the Atari 2600.
